Target: the Kyoto Protocol as well as the enactment of the required legislation during the current Diet session
Polar_expression: intends to take all necessary steps to ensure the approval by the Diet

Source: it is important to establish a common rule in future in which all countries including the United States and developing countries participate

text: " While the government of Japan intends to take all necessary steps to ensure the approval by the Diet of the Kyoto Protocol as well as the enactment of the required legislation during the current Diet session ... it is important to establish a common rule in future in which all countries including the United States and developing countries participate , " the statement said .
